exhibition_title: Mechanically Inclined: Selections from the Katherine Kierland Herberger Collection
exhibition_description: Katherine Herberger did not set out to have one of the most significant collections of antique still and mechanical banks in the country, but at the time of her death in 2003, her collection included more than 1,000 examples. The Katherine Kierland Herberger Collection of Banks has now found a permanent home at The Minneapolis Institute of Arts, where a newly dedicated gallery on the ground floor between the Family Center and classrooms showcases the collection. Mechanically Inclined: Selections from the Katherine Kierland Herberger Collection of Banks, features nearly one hundred examples of mechanical banks that are sure to delight visitors of all ages.
